attributes.action: Stop pizza companies putting peppers on peperoni pizzas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There has been a common trend occuring from many pizza manufactures to include peppers on peperoni pizzas. I am of the view that this causes much unnecessary hassle to a great number of people. Many people like myself who have purchased a "peperoni pizza" have to spend time, which could be better spent doing something else, picking peppers off of their pizza.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
